---
title: "Tidy kinomescan and klaeger SMILES for QSAR"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(webchem)
```

```{r}
#read in data

all_cids = read_csv(here('results/matching/kinomescan_klaeger_cids.csv'))

#CID's converted to SMILES by pubchem identifier exchange service https://pubchem.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/idexchange/idexchange.cgi

all_smiles = read_tsv(here('results/matching/klaeger_kinomescan_combined_smiles.txt'), col_names = FALSE)
```

```{r}
LINCS_klaeger_smiles = all_smiles %>% 
	rename(cid = X1, smiles = X2) %>% 
	left_join(all_cids %>% select(-origin)) %>% 
	unique() %>% 
	drop_na() %>% 
	write_csv(here('results/matching/kinomescan_klaeger_cid_smiles.csv'))
```
